column4: Okay, apparently I have 1885Mbs of ram, according to 'free -m', how big should my  swap be?
it depends on what apps and how much memory they need.  if you don't know, go with the defaults.
use 2 gig. or 6 if you don't like 2.
swap size was more of an issue 10 years ago when ram was expensive and disks were small.  that stuff has grown faster than apps use it.
